TetrisLike3DSolver

Class PentoColor

  • java.lang.Object
    • TetrisLike3DSolver.PentoColor

  • public class PentoColor
extends java.lang.Object
    To avoid depending on color frameworks, and specially to avoid spreading color conversion logic all around, we have this class. It wraps AWT and FX colors and overrides toString to get a descriptive name.
